author: Georgian Civil Service Bureau
name: georgian-public-officials-asset-declarations
notes:
Contains scraped yearly asset declarations for senior public officials in the country of Georgia. Data is submitted yearly by officials, and published in PDF format at http://declaration.ge by the Georgian Civil Service Bureau. 

This data set is created by Transparency International Georgia, who scrapes the PDFs available on http://declaration.ge and converts them into a single data source. Please note that we don't guarantee that our conversion is bug free, so always confirm with the original data when citing to this data. Declaration ids are provided where appropriate for this purpose.

The data is available in delimited UTF-8 text files. The delimiter is a pipe (|).
title: Georgian Public Officials Asset Declarations
